definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
lit. not putting a foot outside/to stay at home
to cause no trouble/to be spared worry/worry-free
to pay up/to shell out/to hand over the money to cover sth
custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
